title: Flashing Crystal Putty Glittery Toys for Kids - 2.5 Inches Non-Toxic Slime | Mysite
description: WHAT YOU GET - 6 pack of cool and fun 3.5 inches Flashing Crystal Putty Super Soft Mud Toy. This has assorted colors with Gooey, slimy, texture and Glittery interior. NON TOXIC SLIME FOR KIDS - Kids slime are made up of non-toxic premium quality materials that has proven and tested to be safe for kids. This does not use dangerous ingredients and labeled to be 100% eco-friendly toy. PERFECT GIFT IDEAS - Putty Slime are the best gifts of all time. This can be given in any occasion like birthdays and many more. This can also be rewards of can be put in party bags. It will bring tons of fun and learning to kids. PROMOTES CREATIVITY - The artistic Flashing Crystal Putty gives not only fun but it also promotes creativity. It is ideal for arts, crafts, and school projects. A cool and fun toys which has educational benefits. SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - Kidsco will make sure that you will be satisfied with this product you buy from us.
